message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL 

This paper is about multi-task learning in Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs), which is a popular topic in computer vision (CV) research. Therefore, cs.CV is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a probabilistic approach to learning task-specific and shared representations in CNNs, which involves variational inference, a common technique in machine learning (LG, AI, and NE). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed method on multiple tasks, which suggests that it may be relevant to natural language processing (NLP) as well (CL).
